about.philosophy:
We create animation where technology meets heart,
where every frame is a breath between the past and the future.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Bold projects require bold solutions. We are not afraid to experiment with form and content.

technology.title: Technology
technology.description: From classic hand-drawn animation to VR — we master the full spectrum of modern tools.

soul.title: Soul
soul.description: Behind every pixel lies a human story. We don't just animate objects — we bring feelings to life.

contact.intro:
Have an idea?
We'll help present it to your audience.
contact.legal_info:
"End of Summer" — independent commercial animation studio
 "End of Summer" Co. Ltd. INN: 6679179711 OGRN: 1246600054601

portfolio.title: Projects
portfolio.intro:
Let's be honest: we love inventing things to do.
Look! Isn't it interesting?

peizazh.title: Landscape Waiting
peizazh.subtitle: Documentary animation
peizazh.description: A study of the author's anxiety through walks on the island of Sviyazhsk

mify.title: Animated scenes and titles for A. Fedorchenko's film "Myths about Hephaestus, God and the Construction Brigade"
mify.subtitle: Feature documentary film
mify.description: Animated stories about the life of the god Hephaestus, told through badges, drawings, and patches on a construction brigade jacket.

strashnyi.title: Terrible City
strashnyi.subtitle: Documentary animation
strashnyi.description: Immersive animation unfolding before the wheels of a night tram. Three scary stories that happened to three different people in the city of Yekaterinburg.

bum.title: "BOOMBOOM: How It Began"
bum.subtitle: Telegram channel and podcast
bum.description: History and chronicles of the creation of the first Ural animated series "BOOMBOOM: Save the Planet"

gospodin.title: Animated scenes for E. Tukhareli's film "Mr. Great"
gospodin.subtitle: Feature documentary film
gospodin.description: Animated chronicle illustrations tell the history of the Novgorod Museum Complex and its transformations with the arrival of a new director.

blokadnaia.title: Development of animation technology for A. Fedorchenko's project "Blockade Mosaic"
blokadnaia.subtitle: Feature film
blokadnaia.description: Telling blockade stories with the help of living volumetric sculptures made of mosaic smalt

mechty.title: Old Bones
mechty.subtitle: Web series,laboratory, joy of life
mechty.description: Animated shorts from the life of two elderly neighbors. We would like to remind elderly people, and ourselves at the same time, how to enjoy moments, feel the present, rejoice in what is, and not grieve for what is already gone and lost.

spiachka.title: Hibernation
spiachka.subtitle: Fantasy for teenagers
spiachka.description: A parkour-loving prankster, the forest dormouse Sonya, who considers sleep the most boring activity in the world, falls into hibernation against her will and travels through the world of other creatures's dreams in search of a way out and herself

kapi.title: Capi and Tapi
kapi.subtitle: Plush adventures in the Amazon jungle
kapi.description: Two friends—Capybara and Tapir—along with their fierce companion Jaguar, make the impossible possible every day.

drakon.title: Ordinary Dragon
drakon.subtitle: Don't splash ketchup on my tapestry.
drakon.description: A very proper dragon meets a very improper royal family.

chto.title: What am I doing here?
chto.subtitle: A docu-animated comedy
chto.description: Two girls decide to conquer the cinema in the most unobvious way.

services.title: Services
services.intro:
Every project is a dialogue between the artist and the viewer,
between technology and soul, between the idea and its realisation.

polny.title: Feature films and series
polny.description: Original animation projects — from concept to final cut. It's definitely interesting!

animation.title: Animated scenes
animation.description: Atmosphere is made up of details. Titles, graphic and animation episodes will help explain complex topics, awaken and support emotions.

science.title: Popular Science
science.description: We turn complex scientific concepts into fascinating visual stories. Science becomes art.

theater.title: Animation support for performances
theater.description: Animated video art for your theatrical production. This is what the stage is waiting for.

festival.title: Festival projects
festival.description: Viewers expect unique energy from every festival. We undertake to make animated screensavers and full visual design.

museum.title: Museum installations
museum.description: Video exhibits, VR installations and complex video branding of museums and galleries. Art in dialogue with technology.

showreel.subtitle:
Let our work speak for itself —
a story lives in every frame.

team.description:
Our team gathered from different spheres:
Animation, Film, Music, Literature, Fine Arts, IT, Theater.
That's why you see so many logos of different festivals, competitions, awards.
We participated in them, received awards and prizes. But we worked not for prizes, but because we know and love our business.
It's true.

privacy_notice.text_desktop: We do not use cookies and we do not collect any personal data.
privacy_notice.text_mobile: We do not collect your data.

general.title: General Provisions
general.p1: This Policy determines the procedure for processing and protecting personal data that may be processed when using the site endofsummer.fun.
general.p2: The operator of personal data is LLC "End of Summer", OGRN 1246600054601, INN 6679179711

data.title: Personal data we may receive
data.p1: We do not collect and process user personal data on the site.
data.p2: Technical data may be automatically recorded: IP address, browser information, date and time of access. The specified data is processed automatically by the hosting provider GitHub Pages solely for the purpose of functioning and ensuring the security of the site.

transfer.title: Transfer to third parties
transfer.p1: We do not transfer personal data to third parties. Technical information is processed by the hosting provider GitHub.

storage.title: Data storage and protection
storage.p1: Technical data is stored for a limited time in server logs and is protected by means provided by the hosting provider.

contact.title: Contact information
contact.p1: For questions related to the processing of personal data, you can contact:
